arts.ttl: Bruno Guimaraes aims foul-mouthed jibe at Sunderland during Newcastle trophy parade
arts.sum: Newcastle celebrated winning their first major domestic trophy in 70 years by staging an open-top bus parade and captain Bruno Guimaraes played a big part in the festivities

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Sunderland 1 Millwall 0 - can Lions still close the gap to Championship play-offs
arts.sum: It’s now back to back away defeats for Alex Neil’s Lions but despite that they remain just six points off the play-offs with seven games to go. Wilson Isidor was denied by a superb Jensen save in the second-half from point-blank range.

arts.ttl: Millwall midfield prospect’s absence for Sunderland loss explained
arts.sum: “He tried to train again on Thursday but had to pull out, so we got it scanned. “He took a kick to his ankle on Monday,” said Lions head coach Alex Neil.

arts.ttl: Sunderland back to winning ways as they edge past Millwall
arts.sum: Trai Hume scored the only goal of the game as promotion-chasing Sunderland claimed a 1-0 win over Millwall.

arts.ttl: Trai Hume fires Sunderland to victory over Millwall with fine finish
arts.sum: The defender scored the only goal of the game in the 20th minute.

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Leipzig want Jobe Bellingham amid links to Chelsea and others
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have made contact for Sunderland midfielder Jobe Bellingham, while Tottenham Hotspur are at the front of the queue for Lille midfielder Angel Gomes . Several clubs across Europe are believed to be keen on the 24-year-old, who is set to become a free agent in the summer, and rejected a pre-contract agreement offer from West Ham. Scouts from Spurs are reported to have watched him on multiple occasions, with manager Ange Postecoglou seeing him as an ideal fit for his system.

arts.ttl: Millwall loanee striker happy to keep talks over his future on ice until the Championship season ends
arts.sum: “It has been really frustrating with the injuries – they have come at the worst possible times,” said Coburn. “I didn’t want my body to break down and that’s why the gaffer was really careful with me in certain games.

arts.ttl: Championship market value update: Jobe Bellingham new league MVP, CJ Egan-Riley biggest winner
arts.sum: Transfermarkt has adjusted the market values of 76 players in the latest Championship market value update. Remarkably, the English second-flight is the sixth most valuable league in world...

arts.ttl: Millwall boss on Ra’ees Bangura-Williams meteoric rise and making it ‘game on’ for the play-offs
arts.sum: “The main benefit of coming through that way is that he was exposed to men’s football however limited that was – because I don’t think he played a huge amount of games there either,” said Neil. Millwall head coach Alex Neil reckons Ra’ees Bangura-Williams should look back on his recent achievements with pride.

arts.ttl: Sunderland boss rules out key defender for Millwall clash
arts.sum: Sunderland boss Regis Le Bris has ruled key defender Dennis Cirkin out of Saturday’s clash against Millwall with a hamstring injury. “We have to respect Millwall,” said Le Bris.
